thread.title: IMAX brings future of cinema to London with next-generation laser projection tech
thread.title_full: IMAX brings future of cinema to London with next-generation laser projection tech

title: IMAX brings future of cinema to London with next-generation laser projection tech
text:
IMAX brings future of cinema to London with next-generation laser projection tech 
The Inquirer Friday 23rd October, 2015 
allowed in this theatre," boomed the president of IMAX, Andrew Cripps, as he explained the process of revamping one of London's biggest cinema screens at the Empire on Leicester Square. "Black, black and black." 
Speaking at the London launch event, Cripps was describing the first step in renovating the prestigious West End theatre's Screen 1 as it prepared for the installation of state-of-the-art IMAX film technology,...
